about.title: About Me

bio.description: I’m a Full-stack Developer who transitioned from electrical engineering to web & mobile development, with a background in embedded systems. I approach every project like solving a puzzle — applying system-level thinking, writing clean code, and crafting user-first experiences.

highlights: Experienced with React, Next.js, and Flutter (Web & Mobile)
Strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Dart
3+ years of development learning with an embedded freelance background
Builds clean, scalable, and user-centric applications
System thinker, passionate about performance and architecture
Thrives in team environments with clear tasks and collaboration
Based in Ho Chi Minh City, open to remote freelance roles for global clients
